name: Bridget Talone
bio: Bridget Talone is the author of The Soft Life (Wonder, 2018) and two chapbooks, Sous Les Yeux (The Catenary Press) and In the Valley Made Personal (No, Dear/Small Anchor Press). She received a 2017 NYSCA/NYFA Artist Fellowship in Poetry from the New York Foundation for the Arts. She lives in Queens, New York.
